synopsis.text: Rintarou, a middle school student, finds himself smitten with Terumi, an employee at a unique telephone company known as Moshimoshi Dou. The company stands out for its strong stance against the internet, a trait that Terumi also shares. The anime chronicles their daily lives, weaving a charming tale of romance and humor against the backdrop of a quirky, technology-averse workplace.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
